definition: to enjoy/to benefit/to have the use of
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to enjoy/to live it up/pleasure/CL:種|种[zhong3]
to share (let others have some of sth good)
to enjoy (i.e. have the use or benefit of)
to live to the (ripe) age of
to live comfortably/happy and prosperous life
to reap where one has not sown (idiom)

sentences.english: Food safety every day, always enjoy healthy life.
sentences.chinese: 食品安全天天講，健康生活歲歲享。

sentences.english: How can we help developing countries to share fully in the technological revolution?
sentences.chinese: 我們怎樣幫助發展中國家也能充分享這一技術革命呢？

sentences.english: Your smiling into me is my daily dose of magic.
sentences.chinese: 你嫣然的微笑是我每日享遭到的魅力。

sentences.english: Cardholder(s) must be among the travelers to enjoy the discount offer.
sentences.chinese: 持卡者必須爲其中一位旅客方可享折扣優惠。

sentences.english: The ealier registration could enjoy the favorable prices.
Henry VIII founded the Church of England.
sentences.chinese: 享利八世創建了英國國教。

sentences.english: Overall, this is a Godzilla movie that everyone can enjoy.
sentences.chinese: 總之，《哥斯拉》是一部每個人都能樂享其中的電影。

sentences.english: Presidential Hotel is the Best Self-Drive Theme Hotel that enjoys advantages of geographical location and tourism resources.
sentences.chinese: 享地理位置和旅遊資源優勢的最佳自駕遊主題酒店。

definition: to enjoy/to live it up/pleasure/CL:種|种[zhong3]
to enjoy sth without lifting a finger
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
abbr. for 特別優惠|特别优惠[te4 bie2 you1 hui4]/ex gratia
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
to bestow (a reward)/to give (to an inferior)/to hand down/a reward (bestowed by a superior)/to appreciate (beauty)
to arrive/to reach (esp. perfection)/utmost/(used in commercials)
